c74object.name: sdt.bouncing~
c74object.digest: Solids interaction: Stochastic sequence of impacts to form a bouncing sound.
c74object.description:
Control model for the generation of bouncing phenomena.
sdt.bouncing~ acts as control layer for the compound impact model formed by sdt.inertial ↔ sdt.impact~ ↔ sdt.modal.
Takes three control parameters: the initial height of the falling object in meters, the shape irregularity and the restitution coefficient. The output is an audio signal representing the impact velocity in m/s.

inlet.description: messages to the bouncing object, bang starts the process.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Inlet 0: Bang triggers the bouncing event.
method.description: Inlet 0: Bang triggers the bouncing event.

attribute.name: restitution
attribute.description: Restitution coefficient of the bounce, between 0. and 1.

attribute.name: height
attribute.digest: Initial height of the falling objects, in m.
attribute.description: Initial height of the falling object in meters.

attribute.name: irregularity
attribute.description: Deviation from a spherical shape, between 0. and 1.
